data.name: TowerDefense
data.description:
Join our Discord:https://discord.gg/XaANxFTN6B to talk, play and connect with us!

[Archive] function and [Achievement] system are now live!

Brave Player, fight and defend your towers! Make deployment routes, release supernatural spells, conquer enemy towers and obtain victory. Defeat Dragon Boss and restore world peace!

TOWER DEFENDER is a strategy TD game. 500 years ago, five Guardians worked together to seal the evil dragon on the lava island. 500 years later, the dragon gradually woke up, and the world once again fell into crisis. You, as the Commander of the Silver Knights, are endowed with the spells and skills of the Guardians. You can break through the casual mode to practice your skills, or you can challenge the dragon boss and fight to the death!

- Immersive gaming experience -
• Added [Archive function], now you can freely archive the game progress
• Added [Achievement System], unlock the level to get surprise rewards
• Become a kingdom warrior, strategically attack towers, defeat the boss, and restore world peace
• Multiple gameplay modes: Survival and Casual
• Experience the changing scenes: Forest, Snowland, Desert, and Cemetry
• Battle Experience: Your soldiers and towers will gradually become more powerful as you defeat more enemies and complete more levels

changelog.change_log:
TowerDefender 3.06 - Full Weapon System - 2 Nov. 2022
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------—
- New spells of five heroes: 
     - Sylvanas: Auto-Ballista & Nature's Rage added
     - Rikimaru: Conspiracy added
     - Calypso: Life Siphon, Flute of Inspiration & Euphony added
     - Surtr: Meteor, Pyroblast, Surprise Dragon Eggs & Die! Maggot! added
     - Froster: Freezing Arrow, Ice Shield & nDqu's Tornado added
- Optimized interactive performance: Tower upgrade effect, Soldier image & new BGM

TowerDefender 3.05 - Halloween Special Edition - 24 Oct. 2022
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------—
- Halloween Gameplay added: Catch the Pumpkin! Your dragon partner will help you to defeat the enemy
- New spells of five heroes: 
     * Sylvanas: Auto-Ballista & Nature's Rage added
     * Rikimaru: Conspiracy added
     * Calypso: Life Siphon, Flute of Inspiration & Euphony added
     * Surtr: Meteor, Pyroblast, Surprise Dragon Eggs & Die! Maggot! added
     * Froster: Freezing Arrow, Ice Shield & nDqu's Tornado added
- Updated Froster's Weapon: it looks amazing now!
- Optimized interactive performance: Tower upgrade effect, Soldier image & new BGM

TowerDefender 3.03 - New Weapon System - 15 Sep. 2022
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------—
- New images of five heroes: Sylvanas, Rikimaru, Calypso, Surtr, and Froster are coming
- New weapon system: Use Surtr's fire hammer, Sylvanas' crossbow, Rikimaru's dagger, Froster's magic wand, and Calypso's flute to fight the enemy!
- Optimized interactive performance: upgraded glove effects, game handbook, tower connection paths, and images

TowerDefender 3.02 - Gameplay Performance Optimization - 8 Aug 2022
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
- Add the upgrade effect of minions in the Roguelike gameplay, now you can observe the form of upgraded minions up close
- Add the art effect of the connection between towers
- Add tower information bar, you can see the various attributes of different towers after the upgrade
- Optimize the interaction of gameplay

TowerDefender 3.01 - LOBBY UPGRADE - 27 JULY 2022
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
- The game has a new entry LOBBY, our “Adventurer’s Cabin” welcomes all players to explore the world of TowerDefender
- Newly introduced "Game Handbook", helping you to learn more information about Tower Defender
- Gloves Upgrade: you may now unleash the supreme power of heroes with way cooler and dazzling gloves

TowerDefender 3.00 - ROGUELIKE UPDATE - JULY 2022
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
- Embark on a super exciting journey in our Roguelike gameplay where you are challenged by many Boss in pursuit of higher records.
- You can experience the changing scenes in the chamber of TowerDefender: Forest, Snowland, Desert, and Cemetry.
- You can freely choose and build your deck to make the best strategy for defeating your enemies.
- Your soldiers and towers will continuously enhance themselves under your leadership.
